headline.main: BRITISH WARSHIPS HERE AT LEAST 12; Navy Lists Warspite, 2 Car- riers, 4 Cruisers Among the Vessels Now in Our Ports BRITISH WARSHIPS HERE AT LEAST 12

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 19 -- One British battleship, two aircraft carriers and four cruisers are among a dozen British vessels named officially by the Navy Department today as being in American ports for repairs or service operations.
abstract: Knox announces pact with Brit on ship news censorship easing; lists Brit ships in U S ports for repairs; Rear Adm Hepburn eays voluntary censorship pact on movement of U S ships continues and other Brit ships are in U S waters
snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 19 -- One British battleship, two aircraft carriers and four cruisers are among a dozen British vessels named officially by the Navy Department today as being in American ports for repairs or service operations....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
